item.title: [Front] Quote Generator
item.description: This project is a submission to a challenge by devchallenges.io, in which one can automatically generate one single quote or quotes associated to a given author. Features Coded using React and the following libraries : framer-motion, styled-components Data fetched using axios and QuoteGarden Demo URL https://quote-generator-beryl.vercel.app
